alert.note: Alert for Greene; Hale; Marengo (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 24 at 7:57PM CST until January 29 at 9:00PM CST by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Alabama... Black Warrior River At Selden Lock and Dam affecting Marengo, Hale and Greene Counties. .Flooding continues on the Black Warrior River and a flood warning remains in effect. The next statement will be issued Thursday morning.Thursday morning at 1100 AM CST. && ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM LATE THURSDAY NIGHT TO LATE MONDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Black Warrior River at Selden Lock and Dam. * WHEN...From late Thursday night to late Monday evening. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:45 PM CST Wednesday the stage was 76.1 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage early Friday morning to a crest of 94.9 feet early Saturday morning. It will then fall below flood stage late Monday morning. - Flood stage is 90.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
